control_attributes.Control: CP-2 (3) RESUME ESSENTIAL MISSIONS / BUSINESS FUNCTIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization plans for the resumption of essential missions and business functions within [Assignment: organization-defined time period] of contingency plan activation.
